name: PaddleFlap (bastisbastis, bei)
description:
Welcome to Paddle Flap, a minimalist casual arcade game where you control a paddle at the bottom of the screen and flap it left or right to bounce falling balls. Use precise timing to control the direction of the balls and hit red targets with red balls and blue targets with blue balls.

Along the way you will collect power-ups and earn achievements. Can you master the art of Paddle Flap and become a top scorer? Play now and find out!

Controls

Keyboard
A/D or cursors LEFT/RIGHT to flap the paddle to the left or right.
Number keys 1-5 to activate a power-up.

Touch
Touch left or right half of the screen to flap the paddle to the left or right.
Tap the power-up icons to activate the power-up.

Wishlist on Steam to get updates on the full desktop release.
